data.text:
Causer is for volunteers to handle their volunteer schedules while engaging with the causes and organizations they care about!

Your volunteer program is using Get Connected volunteer software, giving you access to your volunteer profile right here from the Causer app.

Log in or create your account to connect with your volunteer organization.

From your volunteer dashboard, youÃ­ll be able to view all of your past and upcoming volunteer shifts, or select new volunteer shifts!

Receive push notifications when your volunteer shift is approaching and when you arrive on-site ready to check-in.

You can check in directly from the app when you begin volunteering to ensure your program is able to collect your volunteer hours - data that helps make a bigger difference!

The app will also remind you when it is time to check out and stop your volunteer clock.

From your volunteer profile you can:

~ Add hours without checking in

~ Select new volunteer shifts

~ Manage your volunteer schedule in calendar view

~ Check-in/check-out of volunteer shifts

~ And, see the impact you're making!
